overview: In order to protect the elders of the family, Guo Er, the genius girl from Warrior League came to Shanyu Valley, a place where humans and mutants lived together peacefully. She came across He Bi Qiang, a rogue who lived by his wits. Under the guidance of the Mediator, Gao Yao, the three of them were involved in a series of supernatural cases triggered by the ancient artifact, Energy Crystal. While the love-hate relationship between Guo Er and He Bi Qiang escalated, He Bi Qiang died unexpectedly and turned into a puppet...
title: Leyend of Shanyu Town
